statements: SELECT * FROM player_preferences;
SELECT player_id, theme_choice FROM player_preferences WHERE font_size > 12;
SELECT player_id, color_scheme FROM player_preferences WHERE theme_choice = 'dark';
SELECT player_id, font_size, color_scheme FROM player_preferences ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT theme_choice, color_scheme FROM player_preferences WHERE font_size < 14 ORDER BY color_scheme ASC, theme_choice DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE font_size > 10 ORDER BY color_scheme DESC;
SELECT player_id, theme_choice FROM player_preferences WHERE font_size = 14;
SELECT player_id, theme_choice, color_scheme FROM player_preferences WHERE color_scheme = 'Dark' ORDER BY font_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE font_size BETWEEN 12 AND 16 AND theme_choice LIKE '%Blue%';
SELECT player_id, count(*) as num_preferences FROM player_preferences GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_preferences > 1 ORDER BY num_preferences DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences;
SELECT player_id, theme, font_size FROM player_preferences ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT option_name, description FROM customization_options WHERE is_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, background_color FROM player_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM customization_options ORDER BY option_id ASC, option_name DESC;

SELECT option_name, description FROM customization_options WHERE is_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, theme, background_color FROM player_preferences WHERE font_size BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT option_name, description FROM customization_options ORDER BY option_name DESC;

SELECT player_id, theme_color FROM player_preferences ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, background_image FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 3;

SELECT background_image, player_id, theme_color FROM player_preferences
SELECT player_id, theme_color, background_image FROM player_preferences ORDER BY player_id DESC
SELECT * FROM player_preferences JOIN player_settings ON player_preferences.player_id = player_settings.player_id
SELECT player_id, theme_color, background_image FROM player_preferences WHERE theme_color = 'red'

SELECT display_name, favorite_color FROM player_preferences;
SELECT player_id, display_name, favorite_color FROM player_preferences ORDER BY player_id ASC;

SELECT player_id, theme_settings FROM player_settings WHERE theme_settings != 'default' AND font_settings = 'Arial';

SELECT player_id, score FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
